data.description:
Ethereum is once again testing the strength of its key support band around the $3,700 zone, a level that has acted as a crucial lifeline for bulls in recent months. data.title: Singapore Freezes $150M in Assets Tied to Alleged Bitcoin Fraud Kingpin
data.description:

source: https://cryptonews.com/news/singapore-freezes-150m-in-assets-tied-to-alleged-bitcoin-fraud-kingpin/

data.title: Ethereum(ETH) Surpasses 3,900 USDT with a 4.72% Increase in 24 Hours
data.description: On Oct 31, 2025, 19:34 PM(UTC). According to Binance Market Data, Ethereum has crossed the 3,900 USDT benchmark and is now trading at 3,900.01001 USDT, with a narrowed 4.72% increase in 24 hours.

data.title: Bitcoin(BTC) Surpasses 110,000 USDT with a 2.91% Increase in 24 Hours
data.description: On Oct 31, 2025, 19:34 PM(UTC). According to Binance Market Data, Bitcoin has crossed the 110,000 USDT benchmark and is now trading at 110,076.53125 USDT, with a narrowed 2.91% increase in 24 hours.
